comment._content: Buildings in the background suggest that this is at Victoria Barracks, Sydney.

comment.author: 76381637@N08
comment._content: I think Bob Meade is correct. The picture is probably of a gun and limber combination without the gun. From the uniforms I would say they are probably artillery officers of about the 1880 period.

comment.author: 76381637@N08
comment._content: My apolgies. The gun is present.The barrel is pointing down so I did not notice it under the low magnification. The gun is a muzzle loading field piece about a metre and a half long.
